net.canarymod.motd

Class MessageOfTheDay

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.canarymod.motd.MessageOfTheDay

  • public class MessageOfTheDay
extends java.lang.Object
    Message of the Day container

    Loads and sends the Message of the Day to a player just joining.

    Author:
    Jason (darkdiplomat)

      • sendMOTD

        public void sendMOTD(MessageReceiver msgrec)
        Sends the MOTD to a MessageReceiver
        Parameters:

      • registerMOTDListener

        public void registerMOTDListener(MessageOfTheDayListener listener,
                                 MOTDOwner owner,
                                 boolean force)
        Registers a new MessageOfTheDayListener to be used with the MessageOfTheDay
        Parameters:
        listener - the MessageOfTheDayListener to be added
        owner - the MOTDOwner (either the server or a plugin)
        force - true to override existing keys if existent; false to error out on duplicate keys (recommended)

      • unregisterMOTDListener

        public void unregisterMOTDListener(MOTDOwner owner)
        Removes all of a MOTDOwner's MessageOfTheDayListener methods from the MessageOfTheDay list
        Parameters:
        owner - the MOTDOwner to have MessageOfTheDayListener methods removed
